title: Парочка слідчих
overview: At the heart of the story are Sofia, a young and ambitious investigator just starting her police career, and Pavlo, an experienced forensic expert with a tough personality and a sarcastic sense of humor.Their methods are completely different—just like their worldviews—but each new case forces them to work together. As the tension between them grows, something deeper than just a partnership begins to emerge. This is a story about how the truth can unite even the most different people.
